Class AeDefaultReceiveHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive.AeAbstractReceiveHandler
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive.AeDefaultReceiveHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeBPELReceiveHandler, IAeReceiveHandler
public class AeDefaultReceiveHandler
extends AeAbstractReceiveHandler

Receive handler that simply invokes the BPEL engine.

public IAeMessageData mapInputData(IAeProcessPlan aPlan,
                                   AeExtendedMessageContext aContext,
                                   IAeWebServiceMessageData aData)
                            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Simple conversion from IAeWebServiceMessageData to AeMessageData

Parameters:
aPlan - process plan for service
aContext - MessageContext
aData - Raw Input data
Returns:
input converted to AeMessageData
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
See Also:
IAeBPELReceiveHandler.mapInputData(org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.IAeProcessPlan, org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive.AeExtendedMessageContext, org.activebpel.wsio.IAeWebServiceMessageData)

mapInputData

public IAeMessageData mapInputData(IAeProcessPlan aPlan,
                                   AeExtendedMessageContext aContext,
                                   org.w3c.dom.Document[] aDocArray)
                            throws AeBusinessProcessException
Maps body element data from a SOAP request into a AeMessageData object using information in the process plan and message context. Will attempt to determine the operation based on a signature match. Updates the message context with the operation name.

Parameters:
aPlan - process plan for service
aContext - MessageContext
aDocArray - array of documents containing raw request data
Returns:
AeMessageData mapped from input documents
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
